import React, { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import { Avatar } from '@mui/material' import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import Modal from '@mui/material/Modal'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import { Form} from 'react-bootstrap' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import { Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import TextField from '@mui/material/TextField'; import FormControlLabel from '@mui/material/FormControlLabel' import Checkbox from '@mui/material/Checkbox' const { Group: FormGroup, Label: FormLabel, Control: FormControl } = Form const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: 600, bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '2px solid #000', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, }; const PartnerModal=(props)=>{ const { visible, onClose,type,partner} = props const [closeModal,setCloseModal]=useState(visible) console.log("=====",visible) const handleCancel = () => { //setCloseModal(false) onClose() } const handleSubmit = async () => { Swal.fire( 'Good job!', 'Create Partner Success', 'success' ) } useEffect(() => { setCloseModal(visible) }, [visible]) console.log("yyyy",closeModal); const CreatePartner =()=>{ return( Create Partner
Image Partner name
) } function EditPartner(){ return( Edit Partner
} label="Active/Inactive" />
) } return( { handleCancel() }} //onOk={() => handleSubmit()} open={closeModal} onClose={() => { handleCancel() }} aria-labelledby="modal-modal-title" aria-describedby="modal-modal-description" > {type=='create'? CreatePartner() : EditPartner() } ) } export default PartnerModal
